root.name: Utopia
root.description: OverviewThink you can manage it all?What could arguably be the first strategy game to come out on a console machine, Utopia was one of a kind when it was released. It pitted two players as leaders of rival islands attempting to feed, house and maintain their population in a much more efficient manner then the other player. The player themselves had to watch weather patterns to know where to plant crops, build buildings and where to harbor ships as severe weather like hurricanes and tropical storms could wipe them out.
